methods.name: GetCustomAnimationAssetUidToPlay
methods.doc: Get the animation asset set for this scene node to play.

methods.name: GetCustomGeometricTransform
methods.doc: Get the geometric offset. Any mesh attached to this scene node will be offset using this transform.

methods.name: GetSlotMaterialDependencies
methods.doc: Retrieve the correspondence table between slot names and assigned materials for this object.

methods.name: GetSlotMaterialDependencyUid
methods.doc: Retrieve the Material dependency for the specified slot of this object.

methods.name: RemoveSlotMaterialDependencyUid
methods.doc: Remove the Material dependency associated with the specified slot name from this object.

methods.name: SetCustomAnimationAssetUidToPlay
methods.doc: Set the animation asset for this scene node to play. (This is only relevant for SkeletalMeshActors: scene nodes that are instantiating skeletal meshes.)

methods.name: SetCustomGeometricTransform
methods.doc: Set the geometric offset. Any mesh attached to this scene node will be offset using this transform.

methods.name: SetSlotMaterialDependencyUid
methods.doc: Add a Material dependency to the specified slot of this object.
